name: Plants vs Zombies in Pygame
description:
I made this Plants vs Zombies CLONE in Python using the Pygame module.

Please play the original, proper, well made game on https://www.ea.com/games/plants-vs-zombies/plants-vs-zombies?isLocalized=true.

This has been by far my biggest project with Pygame and perhaps my last with my focus now streaming over to the Unity Game Engine . 

New additions

  • Different Zombies
  • More plants
  • Menu system
  • Plant card recharge
  • Wave system 
  • Bowling minigame
  • Sound effects
  • Zombie death animations
  • Progress bar

The journey through Pygame has been great.
